  16. ‌type ('a, 'b) t = Left of 'a | Right of 'b

  18. ‌let left v = Left v
  19. ‌let right v = Right v

  21. ‌let is_left = function
  22. | Left _ -> true
  23. | Right _ -> false

  25. ‌let is_right = function
  26. | Left _ -> false
  27. | Right _ -> true

  29. ‌let find_left = function
  30. | Left v -> Some v
  31. | Right _ -> None

  33. ‌let find_right = function
  34. | Left _ -> None
  35. | Right v -> Some v

  37. ‌let map_left f = function
  38. | Left v -> Left (f v)
  39. | Right _ as e -> e

  41. ‌let map_right f = function
  42. | Left _ as e -> e
  43. | Right v -> Right (f v)

  45. ‌let map ~left ~right = function
  46. | Left v -> Left (left v)
  47. | Right v -> Right (right v)

  49. let fold ~left ~right = function
  50. | Left v -> left v
  51. | Right v -> right v

  53. let iter = fold

  55. let for_all = fold

  57. let equal ~left ~right e1 e2 = match e1, e2 with
  58. | Left v1, Left v2 -> left v1 v2
  59. | Right v1, Right v2 -> right v1 v2
  60. | Left _, Right _ | Right _, Left _ -> false

  62. let compare ~left ~right e1 e2 = match e1, e2 with
  63. | Left v1, Left v2 -> left v1 v2
  64. | Right v1, Right v2 -> right v1 v2
  65. | Left _, Right _ -> (-1)
  66. | Right _, Left _ -> 1
